# HPKE.KDF.HKDF_SHA384

**Case**

An HMAC-based key derivation function that uses SHA-2 hashing with a 384-bit digest.

## Declaration

```swift
case HKDF_SHA384
```
title: HPKE.KDF.HKDF_SHA384
